tools.title: IconStore
tools.desc: A library of free vector icons for personal and commercial projects, designed by first-class designers.

tools.title: to[icon]
tools.desc: Pixel-perfect vector icons with personality, free for your use.

tools.title: Maki Icons
tools.desc: Maki is an icon set made for map designers. Maki includes 124 icons for common points of interest like parks, museums, and places of worship.

tools.title: Icons Mind
tools.desc: 2,080 icons in 53 different categories, designed pixel Perfect and ready for iOS, Android & Websites.

tools.title: Capitalist Icons
tools.desc: 600 beautiful icons across 10 categories will provide you with the necessary variety to cover you for any design project.

tools.title: Prestashop Official Icon Pack
tools.desc: Free and open source iconset from the PrestaShop design team

tools.title: IconScout
tools.desc: 61179+ high quality free and premium icons in all style, sizes and format by 58+ designers

tools.title: RoundIcons
tools.desc: Round Icons is a library of premium icon packs covering all styles and always updated with new sets

tools.title: Pioneer Icons
tools.desc: 1010 High quality icons in 3 styles, for websites, apps, presentations, for you and your business, built with Sketch 4

tools.title: Ionicons
tools.desc: Ionicons is an open-sourced and MIT licensed icon pack
